parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The mission is launched (from the main menu). Both campaign and mission are given as their directory name. If the campaign is empty, a single mission is launched. If skipBriefing is true, the intro and briefing are skipped.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''playMission''' [campaign, mission, skipBriefing]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> campaign: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mission: [[String]] or [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> skipBriefing (optional): [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["XOutrage","x05Negotiator.Noe"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["", configFile >> "CfgMissions" >> "Missions" >> "Armory1"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["","\A3\Missions_F_Bootcamp\Scenarios\Arsenal.VR"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[hostMission]], [[playScriptedMission]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
